name: I'm Azon
description:
You’re Azon, an employee of some anonymous department store.
As a good employee, you’ll have to take the correct packages to the correct delivery zone. You’ll have to dodge someother sad employee while you carry the packages and also there will be special packages that can make a huge mess or benefit you so much.

All this while your boss is seeking for you to see if you’re doing you job properly aaand… be careful to not anger him or he will fire you!
